bibl.title: An Antonine Consul Suffect.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: CP 55 (1960) pp. 177-178. P. Clermont-Ganneau Inv. 1b (= S.B. VI, 9228), 21. If the consul in the papyrus is not the Gallus of 153, he is a new consul suffect in the last nundinum of one of the years 149-52.

bibl.title: James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers

bibl.seg: Gilliam James Frank, An Antonine Consul Suffect.
James Frank Gilliam, Roman Army Papers = Mavors Roman Army Researches. 2 (Amsterdam, 1986) pp. 221-222; - 443.

Reproduit de: CP 55 (1960) pp. 177-178. P. Clermont-Ganneau Inv. 1b (= S.B. VI, 9228), 21. If the consul in the papyrus is not the Gallus of 153, he is a new consul suffect in the last nundinum of one of the years 149-52.
